landing.title: ANTIGRAVITY
landing.subtitle: Defy creative limits. Transform your sketches into 3D characters, storyboards, and merchandise with AI.
landing.feature_analysis_desc: Instantly analyze your character's traits and style with Gemini Vision.
landing.feature_refine_desc: Transform sketches into high-quality 3D renders automatically.
landing.feature_assets_desc: Generate storyboards, mockups, and emoticons in seconds.
